description:
Learn the 3 Keys to effectively use LinkedIn as both a networking and marketing tool.

This course is designed to give you a great foundation so you can begin making better use of LinkedIn!

LinkedIn is a powerful social networking and marketing tool which can be used to find sales leads, business opportunities, increase your online brand, boost your career opportunities and to showcase your professional accomplishments.

Profile views can create opportunities. This course is designed to help you get more profile views, and grow your network.

Learn the importance of having a plan so you can make the most effective use of LinkedIn.
title: Learn To Love LinkedIn 101
